lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr broke a tie with Mark Messier for No. 2 on the NHL career points list. Afterward, he was upset about the two standings points the Florida Panthers let slip away with a 3-1 loss to Boston.

headline.print_headline: Jaromir Jagr Breaks Tie for No. 2, Panthers Fall to Bruins
headline.main: Jaromir Jagr Breaks Tie for No. 2, Panthers Fall to Bruins
